what do you meab by vm and vp's?
first of all, it's sudo -i.  Second, you generally do NOT need to use it
i found it using sudo apt-get install ircd-hybrid
most irc bots written in perl use the newer POE::Component::IRC or POE::Component::IRC::State instead of the outdated Net::IRC
sudo apt-get install libperl-net-irc  or sudo cpan Net::IRC
most perl users recommend the use of POE::Component::IRC or POE::Component::IRC::State instead of Net::IRC due to Net::IRC being outdated
its package name in ubuntu's repos is libpoe-component-irc-perl
you can also install it via CPAN
